clearAll(com.google.android.gms.common.a.Description: Clear all notifications for the current game and signed-in player. Required API: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#Games#API_E@ Required Scopes: @B_com#google#android#gms#games#Games#SCOPE_GAMES_E@
